docstring.long_description:
Through the FFT algorithm, the input vector will be transformed from a time domain into a frequency domain, which will be an ordered pair of arrays.

Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair
    The data to apply FFT to.
docstring.short_description: Perform a Discrete Fourier Transform on the input vector.

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: the node will apply a window to the signal to avoid spectral leakage

parameters.name: real_signal
parameters.description: whether the input signal is real or complex

parameters.name: sample_rate
parameters.description: the sample rate of the signal, defaults to 1

parameters.name: display
parameters.description: whether the output would be graphed, set to false for pure data and true for data that is more suitable to be graphed

returns.description:
x: frequency
y: spectrum of the signal

time: time domain
frequency: frequency domain
real: real section of the signal
imag: imaginary section of the signal
